Game.Name: From TV Animation One Piece - Treasure Wars 2 - Buggy Land e Youkoso (Japan)
Game.plot: Gameplay:In the game you play as one of the straw hats and then fights versus another straw hat in a board game. The goal is to get the treasure first. Playable CharactersMonkey D. Luffy Roronoa Zoro Nami Usopp Sanji Tony Tony Chopper
